Recently fixskilled Kips to be 3x PF and 2x MoC at level 65. I got one point of enhancive MoC on my badge and his killing potential has just jumped up significantly. The downside is I'm no longer 2x Dodge but I'll be back at 2x by the mid 70s. Just need berserk and my little warrior will feel complete.
